scripts.dev:start: yarn dev:up -d && exec `yarn dev:tailwindcss:watch` && exec `yarn dev:esbuild:watch`
scripts.db:reset: yarn db:drop && yarn db:create && yarn db:migrate && yarn db:seed
scripts.test:migrate: docker-compose run --rm web bundle exec rake db:test:prepare
scripts.test:unit: docker-compose run --rm web bundle exec rspec spec/ --exclude-pattern 'spec/cypress/*'
scripts.dev:lint: docker-compose run --rm web bundle exec rubocop
scripts.dev:lint:autocorrect: docker-compose run --rm web bundle exec rubocop -a
scripts.deploy:check:staging: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap staging deploy:check'
scripts.deploy:staging: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap staging deploy'
scripts.deploy:staging:rollback: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap staging deploy:rollback'
scripts.deploy:staging:restart: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap staging puma:restart'
scripts.deploy:check:production: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap production deploy:check'
scripts.deploy:production: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap production deploy'
scripts.deploy:production:rollback: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap production deploy:rollback'
scripts.deploy:production:restart: docker-compose run --rm web bash -c 'eval `ssh-agent -s` && ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa && bundle exec cap production puma:restart'
